transcript: You know, actually I wanted to go a little further up the coast and get away from all the lights and people, but I was afraid we'd miss it. How you doing?

segments.text: You know, actually I wanted to go a little further up the coast and get away from all the lights and people, but I was afraid we'd miss it.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: You know actually I wanted to go a little further up the coast and get away from all the lights and people but I was afraid you'd miss it.  How are you doing?
